summary: One Shack for each city, with sleeping and storage facilities.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][b][color=#cc0000][color=#cc0000][size=6][u][i][center]Tam's City Shacks[/center]
[/i][/u][/size][/color][/color][/b][color=#cc0000][line][/color]

[color=#3c78d8]Coming back to town after a long days adventuring, carrying more stuff than you thought you could fit in your bag. You just want somewhere to put your stuff and go to bed, BUT! You forgot. You're poor, and you're not respected enough to be Thane... You don't have a home in this city. You could go to an Inn, of course, but with all your hoarded loot and all the twitchy fingers in there, that wouldn't be a very good idea. Besides, you don't want to drag your haul all the way to Riften to sell it, but you don't have a fence in this city... You seem to have a huge problem.[/color]

[color=#e06666]Is the above text correct? Do you have this problem often? Do you wish there was an easier solution? [u]Look no further![/u] A friendly beggar have put up shacks in every city, for your convenience. They're not pretty, they're not big, but they've got a fireplace, a bed, some food and a barrel where you can store your stuff. [u]The barrels are even magical enough that you can store your things in Whiterun and grab em from the sister barrel in Riften!

[/u][/color][color=#cc0000][line][/color]
[color=#cc0000][line][/color]

[b][color=#cc0000][u][size=5]Description[/size][/u]

[/color][/b][color=#e06666]This mod is for those lazy people who don't want to spend time and gold to get a house in each city. It adds a tiny shack in every hold capital. Nothing fancy, really. There's a bed, a couple of barrels, a fireplace. Some food scattered about. No gold, no free stuff, not really any decorations. The Shacks are navmeshed, but due to the size it is recommended to let any followers wait outside. Now for the facts.[/color]

[color=#cc0000][line][/color]

[color=#f1c232][size=4][u]Whiterun Shack[/u][/size]

[/color][/font][list][*][font=Times New Roman][color=#f1c232][size=2]Available with and without General Stores.[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#f1c232][size=2]Available in merged ESP.[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Times New Roman][size=2][b][color=#ff7700]Non-GS version[/color][/b][color=#f1c232] comes with with 1 bed, 1 [/color][u][color=#00ff00]Safe[/color][/u][color=#f1c232] Strongbox, 2 [/color][u][color=#00ff00]Safe[/color][/u][color=#f1c232] barrels; one at the end of the bed and one standing beneath the Garlic, 3 [/color][u][color=#ff0000]unsafe[/color][/u][color=#f1c232] bar[/color][/size][color=#f1c232]rels, 3 [/color][u][color=#ff0000]unsafe[/color][/u][color=#f1c232] sacks, some clutter.[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Times New Roman][b][color=#ff00ff]GS Version[/color][/b][color=#f1c232] comes with ---?[/color][/font][/*]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#f1c232][size=2]Completely Navmeshed.[/size][/color][/font][/*]
[/list][list][*][font=Times New Roman][color=#f1c232]Rain-proof.[/color][/font][/*]
[/list][font=Times New Roman]
[color=#cc0000][size=2][line][/size][/color]

[u][color=#6fa8dc][size=3]Riften Shack

[/size][/color][/u][color=#6fa8dc]W.I.P[/color]
[size=2]
[/size][/font]
author: Tamardia
